press_nose.description: Press the nose of the dispenser to release substance.

rotate_nose.description: Rotate the nose of the dispenser to adjust the flow.

open_lid.description: Open the lid of the dispenser for refilling.

close_lid.description: Close the lid of the dispenser after refilling.

clean_dispenser.description: Clean the body of the dispenser to maintain hygiene.

operate_dispenser.description: Operate the dispenser by first pressing the nose, then rotate it, open the lid, refill and then close the lid.

clean_whole_dispenser.description: Clean the entire dispenser including the nose, lid, and body.
